foss_contributions.vision: Develop and maintain open-source applications and frameworks, including Corebel Engine, a lightweight 3D engine for developers focused on simplicity and performance.

laptop.justification: A mid-range laptop with high-performance specifications (16GB RAM, SSD storage, and a powerful GPU) is essential for developing, testing, and running 3D applications efficiently.

impact.short_term: Kickstart the development of Corebel Engine, releasing its alpha version as open-source.
impact.long_term: Create a suite of open-source tools and libraries for developers to enhance productivity and creativity.
